thread.title: Rosie O’Donnell wants to play Steve Bannon on SNL
thread.title_full: Rosie O’Donnell wants to play Steve Bannon on SNL

author: Greg P.
title: Rosie O’Donnell wants to play Steve Bannon on SNL
text:
Rosie O’Donnell wants to play Steve Bannon on SNL Posted at 11:28 am on February 7, 2017 by Greg P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
With the success of Melissa McCarthy lampooning White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer on “Saturday Night Live” over the weekend, some are wondering if Rosie O’Donnell should be recruited to play Chief White House Strategist Steve Bannon: Trump, @Rosie , was upset that a staffer was played by a woman, and you do a great impression of him. Willing to take one for the team? 
— Calvin Enemy Philips (@calvininsf) February 7, 2017 
Rosie’s up for the challenge: @calvininsf – i am here to serve – alec has trump – melissa has spice – i would need a few days to prepare – so if called – i will be ready
